      • getDiagnosticsForPackage

        public DiagnosticSet getDiagnosticsForPackage(java.lang.String packageName,
                                              boolean includeSubpackages)
        Returns the diagnostics for the given package, and optionally, sub-packages.
        Parameters:
        packageName - the package name
        includeSubpackages - if true, also include diagnostics for sub-packages
        Returns:
        the set of diagnostics for the given package
